text: Cyril Calvin Pinder (November 13, 1946 â€“ January 23, 2021) was an American professional football player. He was a running back in the National Football League (NFL) for the Philadelphia Eagles, Chicago Bears, and Dallas Cowboys from 1968 to 1973. He played college football for the Illinois Fighting Illini. He was born in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Pinder died on January 23, 2021 in Urbana, Illinois at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American football running backs Category:Philadelphia Eagles players Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:Sportspeople from Illinois Category:Sportspeople from Fort Lauderdale, Florida Category:People from Urbana, Illinois
title: Cyril Pinder
